value.title: 5 tips for Power BI Paginated reports
value.excerpt: Get 5 tips for Power BI Paginated reports from Paginated report bear, Chris Finlan and Patrick! These 5 tips can help you on your journey with Power BI Paginated reports.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba

value.title: A Power Query feature you may not know about!
value.excerpt: We thought everyone knew about this Power Query capability! At the Power Platform Conference, we found that many did not. Well, we want to help make sure everyone is aware so that you can reuse your awesome Power Query work in Power BI or Excel!  ðŸ“¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Add a domain to your Power BI tenant (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)

value.title: Add a measure without Power BI Desktop (Premium)
value.excerpt: Need to add a measure to your Power BI dataset? Can't download it back in Power BI Desktop? Patrick shows you how you can still add that measure even though you can't use Power BI Desktop!  Tabular Editor 2 https://github.com/TabularEditor/TabularEditor  Tabular Editor 3 https://tabulareditor.com/  ðŸ“¢

value.title: Answering your datamart questions
value.excerpt: You've got a LOT of questions about datamarts in Power BI! Adam answers a few that we've seen popping up. Giving his thoughts on these questions.  Introduction to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview  Comparing dataflows to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview#comparing-dataflows-to-datamarts

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  ðŸ“¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want

value.title: Case of the Broken Power BI Incremental Refresh
value.excerpt: Are you using Power BI incremental refresh? Have you had it not work even though you set everything up? In this video, Patrick looks at a scenario where Power BI incremental refresh was broken. He then looks at a way to get Power BI incremental refresh working properly.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube

value.title: Composite models in Power BI and Storage modes - what to pick???

value.title: Dealing with orphaned Power BI workspaces
value.excerpt: What are orphaned Power BI Workspaces and how do you get rid of them? What if you have a lot of them? Adam walks through some options including a PowerShell script! value.title: Discovering data within Power BI and quickly EXPORT!
